name: Abyss Fantasy
description:
This is a model I made a while back for a game I've been working on. Some people have asked me for the model.

Uploading here rather than wasting space on my google drive.
This is a mix with AbyssOrangemix 2 or 3, a couple fantasy models that I'm afraid I can't remember, (aZovyaRPGtools might be one of them) with a touch of kenshi. This model does some more intricate details better than Abyss did. This was my attempt at getting better hair, gems, and variety.

Abyss has some limitations that I was able to get over with this mix and do a better job with fantasy creatures.

You're welcome to use it for anything you'd like.

This model can produce NSFW content as well as sfw content, though I often have to specify when I want it SFW.

The model is great with other models such as epi noise offset.

More generations (though heavily photoshopped) can be seen in my highly nsfw game located at http://daemonden.com/
